4.caption_en:
Caption: High-level architecture diagram of the Siemens MindSphere platform showing three layers — Application Platform, Services Platform, and MindConnect Elements — with provided services, supported third-party elements, and cloud providers (Alibaba Cloud, AWS, Azure) for deployment. The diagram highlights apps, services (Redis, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, CloudFoundry), connectivity/analytics/IoT service groups, and hardware connectors (MindConnect Nano, IoT2040, Lib).

{
  "artifact_type": "architecture_diagram",
  "title": "Siemens MindSphere Platform Overview",
  "description": "Layered diagram showing application creators, third-party apps and existing hardware flowing into the MindSphere Application Platform, Services Platform, and MindConnect Elements, with integration to existing enterprise/cloud resources and runs-on cloud providers.",
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "Left Actors",
      "components": [
        "Application Creators (MindAccess DevOps Plan, MX)",
        "Third Party Apps",
        "Existing Hardware (can be MindSphere enabled)"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "MindSphere Application Platform",
      "components": [
        "Apps: Starter Application, MindSphere Applications",
        "Provided Services: Redis, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, CloudFoundry"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "MindSphere Services Platform",
      "components": [
        "Core Services",
        "Advanced Services",
        "IoT Services",
        "Analytics Services",
        "Connectivity Services"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "MindConnect Elements",
      "components": [
        "MindConnect Nano",
        "MindConnect IoT 2040",
        "MindConnect Lib",
        "Third Party Agents / Third Party Elements"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Right Integration Targets",
      "components": [
        "Runs on: Alibaba Cloud, AWS, Azure",
        "Existing Cloud Resources",
        "Enterprise Systems",
        "On Premise Solutions"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "provided_services": [
    "Redis",
    "MongoDB",
    "RabbitMQ",
    "PostgreSQL",
    "CloudFoundry"
  ],
  "deployment_targets": [
    "Alibaba Cloud",
    "AWS",
    "Azure"
  ],
  "integration_points": [
    "Existing Cloud Resources",
    "Enterprise Systems",
    "On Premise Solutions",
    "Third Party Apps and Agents"
  ],
  "hardware_connectors": [
    "MindConnect Nano",
    "MindConnect IoT 2040",
    "MindConnect Lib"
  ],
  "notes": "Diagram emphasizes flow from creators/hardware to platform layers and onward to cloud or enterprise integrations."
}
